EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_BuildingMicroWithASPNETCore_eBook_Q417.Download Confi
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Building Microservices with ASP.NET Core
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Building Microservices with ASP.NET Core eBook. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey. If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
For in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[http://info.pivotal.io/NU00CI0C000u0hJ0JA0002N]]>, taking place December 4-7, 2017 in San Francisco.
